body.p:
Greensburg Ky Aug 6th 1861
B. Magoffin Governor
Dear Sir

I hereby tender My resignation of the office of Maj. of Adair Battelion K. S. G conferd uppon me and dated Decr 12th 1860 please acept the Same and notify me of acceptance. very respectfully &c your Obt Svt

E. H. Hobson
E. H. Hobson
Resignation
accepted Aug 15. 1861
